title: Message to President Paul von Hindenburg of Germany on the Moratorium on Intergovernmental Debts and Reparations.
text:
I HAVE RECEIVED with great appreciation your communication of July 7. It is my sincere hope and expectation that this proposal which has been presented to and accepted by the nations of the world will revive confidence and promote prosperity among all peoples.

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [His Excellency Field Marshal Paul von Beneckendorff und von Hindenburg, president of the Reich, Berlin, Germany]
